comment.content: 1. Can Maven set without connect outside network for temporary? (until proxy setting done) yes 2. Isn’t it slow? (in real project, not sample project) no

post.content: Does anyone have Maven experience? Please let me know if you don't mind. I have couple of questions. For instance, 1. Can Maven set without connect outside network for temporary? (until proxy setting done) 2. Isn’t it slow? (in real project, not sample project) 3. Anything else?
post.title: Anyone Maven experience?
